redistverse

The redistverse is a set of packages for redistricting data downloading, spatial preprocessing, simulation, analysis, and visualization. This package makes it easy to install and load multiple redistverse packages at once.

Installation 

# install stable version from CRAN
install.packages("redistverse")
# development version
remotes::install_github("alarm-redist/redistverse")

Core Packages

library(redistverse) loads the core redistverse packages:

  • redist
  • redistmetrics
  • ggredist
  • geomander
  • sf

Related, Installed Packages

Related packages are installed:

  • PL94171
  • tinytiger
  • alarmdata
  • easycensus
  • censable
  • birdie
